review.title: “For those who wanna learn here u must be, those who wna earn forget it!”
review.pros: Pros – Friendly work culture, Support from Management, Transparency with any issues, Learn a lot rather provokes a self building attitude with multi-tasking operations given.
review.cons: Cons – Salary issues, Delay in project completion
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Salary is the biggest motivation factor for any employee please dont delay it, care for employee and in return just see how he will pay you back with his loyalty and hard work
